alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Floyd; Giles; Grayson; Montgomery; Pulaski; Wythe (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 3:01PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...Heavy showers and thunderstorms will impact portions of Alleghany and northeastern Ashe Counties in northwestern North Carolina, Pulaski, southeastern Giles, western Floyd, Carroll, southeastern Wythe, eastern Grayson and Montgomery Counties in southwestern Virginia, the City of Radford and the City of Galax through 330 PM EDT... At 259 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking an area of showers and developing thunderstorms along a line extending from near Poplar Hill to near Draper to near Spring Valley to near West Jefferson. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and torrential rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Torrential rain could lead to localized flooding of poor drainage areas and ponding water on roads. Locations impacted include... Blacksburg... Christiansburg... Radford... Pulaski... Galax... Hillsville... and Dublin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
